content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Baihu Li. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Can you please provide me with your offer for the monthly rental fee?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to pay the lowest possible price. So, I would like to know the current rental market price for similar apartments in Munich. Can you provide me with this information?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Baihu Li. I can tell you that the current rental market price for a 25-square-meter apartment in Munich varies depending on location and other factors. However, based on my research, I believe that a reasonable rental price for a similar apartment in this city would be around 1,200 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think the monthly rental fee of 1,200 Euros is too high. Can you provide me with a lower rental price?

I would like to negotiate with you.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Of course, I am open to negotiating with you, Baihu Li. Based on your offer, I would be willing to consider a rental price of 1,000 Euros per month. However, please keep in mind that this is my bottom line, and I may not be able to go any lower.
name: Heinrich Heine
